definition: assistive device (walking frame, hearing aid etc)
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: The utilization of appropriate assistive devices could enhance their independence and improve their quality of life.
sentences.chinese: 輔具的使用，可以提高其生活獨立性，改善生活品質。

sentences.english: Cultivate expertise in the application of assistive technology to instruction and other fields.
sentences.chinese: 培養研發身心障礙者學習與生活輔具專長人才。

sentences.english: Jinan North Welding Tool Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 濟南諾斯焊接輔具有限公司。

sentences.english: Lots of visual aids or only a few?
sentences.chinese: 有很多視覺輔具還是一點點？

definition: golden years (after the age of about 60)
